tooltip.shieldextracontent.locked_soul.t: §8§oI can feel how this soul wants to come out and let out pure light.
§a§lUsage: §r&aWhen you press the RMB, you release a locked soul emitting a bright light that emits enough light to escape the darkness
tooltip.shieldextracontent.unholy_soul.t: §8§oEww, looks... It's terrifying, I've never seen such an abundance of parasites...
§8§oPreviously, this soul was holy and filled with pure light. Now it has become a terrifying trinket
§8§oPreviously, this soul was holy and filled with pure light. Now it has become a terrifying trinket
